buginfo.description: Script that collects environment info for Quarkus issue reports

indexcatalog.description: Script that indexes a catalog into a Quarkus Registry format

builditemdoc.description: Script that generates an Asciidoc for all the BuildItems in the Quarkus core repository. Run with `find extensions -name "*BuildItem.java" | jbang builditemdoc@quarkusio > docs/src/main/asciidoc/build-items.adoc` in the root of a cloned quarkusio/quarkus repository
